properties.name: MakerDAO CDP
properties.tagline: Open a MakerDAO CDP to explore the world of DeFi
properties.content: MakerDAO's CDP portal allows you to easily enter the world of DeFi and open a Collateralized Debt Position with your Ether - allowing you to borrow DAI against it. Use this DAI to buy more Eth and gain a leveraged long exposure, or to cash out to USD to buy real things! Just make sure you don't get liquidated. To complete this quest, open a MakerDAO CDP at https://cdp.makerdao.com/
